childMarkdownRemark.html: Four new colors from To Market are now available to create a beautiful parquet wood floor look.
childMarkdownRemark.excerpt: Four new colors from To Market are now available to create a beautiful parquet wood floor look.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Choose from 24x24” tiles in Tuscan, Paris, Amsterdam or Barcelona.

Additionally, there are 9x60” full plank options in the following color ways: Portofino, Capri and Positano.

24x24” Terrazzo-look tiles are also available in four new color ways: Glasgow, Nice, Berlin and Miami.

Florence is another member of the Destinations Collection. It comes in a 36x36” square LVT and beautifully replicates the iconic Italian marbling that can elevate any space.

Loop Architectural Materials is your local representative for ToMarket. If you have any questions, want a sample, or would like a presentation, don't hesitate to contact us!

nodes.title: The Dawn of Acoustic Intelligence with BuzziSpace

childMarkdownRemark.html: Acoustic Intelligence is about considering the fundamentals of sound from the very beginning of the design process.
childMarkdownRemark.excerpt: Acoustic Intelligence is about considering the fundamentals of sound from the very beginning of the design process.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Acoustics are often taken for granted until excessive noise is distracting and a total drain on overall mood and productivity. BuzziSpace embodies this holistic philosophy, creating furniture that is perceptive to how you hear and feel.

Did you know that 50% of workers have identified to be more productive in a less noisy environment while over 70% frequently lose concentration? 44% of the research group also stated that their company does nothing to address noise.

Well-being - The state of being comfortable, healthy or happy

How to Create Well-Being by Design

The ABCs for Well-Being by Design

A — Absorb

Absorb sound waves to reduce reverberation and noise levels in a specific area.

B — Block

Create acoustic barriers between occupants using screens & partitions to improve speech & visual privacy = fewer distractions.

C - Contain

Reduce distractions by using acoustic furniture to contain sound at its source. MeSpace in a WeSpace.

D - Displace

Displace the noise by providing access to dedicated phone booths, informal meeting areas & collaboration spaces with extra absorption.

Loop Architectural Materials is your local representative for BuzziSpace. If you have any questions, want a sample, or would like a presentation, don't hesitate to contact us!

nodes.title: Introducing the Topo Collection from RBW

childMarkdownRemark.html: Topo is a new sconce collection featuring sleek outlines and subtle textures.
childMarkdownRemark.excerpt: Topo is a new sconce collection featuring sleek outlines and subtle textures.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Exuding both elegance and warmth, Topo joins the simplicity of an elliptical glass globe with the organic texture of an innovative new material. The new sconce collection features two sizes in a selection of rich earth tones, emphasizing the warmth of the light as it illuminates the organic patterns of the backplate's surface.

Explore Topo @RBW

The First of Its Kind

As a unique addition to the lighting market, Topo is the first to feature an innovative composite material combining the strength and durability of cement with the flexibility of FSC and PEFC-certified wood.

Well Rounded

Five distinct color options and two sizes make Topo a versatile addition to a range of projects, with added dimming capabilities and leading energy efficiency.

Textural Appeal

The innovative backplate material evokes the familiar patterns and textures of terrazzo with an added organic warmth, while meeting the requirements to support the latest LEED certification.

Organic & Understated

The elliptical glass bulb and textures of the circular backplate join seamlessly to create a minimal and inviting appearance.

Configure Topo @RBW

Loop Architectural Materials is your local representative of RBW. If you have any questions, want a sample, or would like a presentation, don't hesitate to contact us.

nodes.title: Introducing FACT - Folding Acoustical Ceiling Tiles

childMarkdownRemark.html: FACT is on a mission is to make great acoustics easy, affordable, and sustainable.
childMarkdownRemark.excerpt: FACT is on a mission is to make great acoustics easy, affordable, and sustainable.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
What sets FACT apart is ease. Ease for the specifier and the installer. Greater ease and wellbeing for people in the space. A product that’s easier on the environment. An acoustic solution that’s easy to love.

Explore Ceiling Tiles from FACT

Simplicity in Specification

FACT acoustic tiles are available in unique shapes and four easy neutrals. Just fold and drop into your ceiling grid to instantly improve your space. Specify myriad colors using kvadrat’s Divina MD collection.

American Made, Internationally Designed, Sustainably Minded

FACT is proud to be a part of the Sweetwater, Tennessee community and supporting small town manufacturing. Collaborations with 13&9 Design, Paul Jackson, and Peter Dahmen inform the design.

With a deep commitment to sustainable practices, FACT helps you create healthier, stress-free spaces that are better for people and the environment.

FACT tiles are made from PET felt that contains 60% pre-consumer recycled content. You can recycle 100% of your FACT products. Even our hardware is made of PET.

We produce almost zero waste in making FACT products. Lean manufacturing at our factory also ensures minimal use of natural resources.

Don't Forget the Walls!

Each wall tile is designed with a beveled edge adding both dimensionality and modularity to the design.

Explore Wall Tiles from FACT

Loop Architectural Materials is your local representative of FACT. If you have any questions, need a sample, or would like a presentation, don't hesitate to contact us.

nodes.title: New Acoustic Lighting Solutions from BuzziSpace

childMarkdownRemark.html: BuzziBurner, BuzziPebl, and BuzziSurf address lighting and acoustics with a single solution.
childMarkdownRemark.excerpt: BuzziBurner, BuzziPebl, and BuzziSurf address lighting and acoustics with a single solution.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
BuzziSpace has launched a new collection of acoustic lighting solutions that addresses the issue of excessive noise in spaces where people work and socialize.

The collection includes three lighting designs: BuzziPebl, BuzziBurner, and BuzziSurf, each featuring integrated sound-absorbing materials that help to reduce echoes and noise.

These lighting solutions are designed with contemporary and decorative elements and come in warm, amorphous shapes that are of the moment. They’re designed to fit into all spaces from work to hospitality to home.

BuzziPebl

The BuzziPebl Light is a wall sconce that offers indirect accent lighting and can be wall-mounted or ceiling-suspended.

BuzziBurner

BuzziBurner features a cone-shaped shade that provides dimmable LED lighting and acoustic privacy.

BuzziSurf

BuzziSurf is an acoustic pendant light with an elongated surfboardish design and is available in a variety of shapes and sizes.

BuzziSpace offers a helpful, free downloadable BuzziSpace RT60 v3.0 app for iOS designed to measure the reverberation time of room acoustics. It allows you to easily simulate the impact BuzziSpace products would have on your space.

Loop Architectural Materials is your local representative of BuzziSpace. If you have any questions, want a sample, or would like a presentation, don't hesitate to contact us.

childMarkdownRemark.html: Our Spring 2022 Collection has us prepared and excited for the structure and rhythm of getting back some of our previous normal.
childMarkdownRemark.excerpt: Our Spring 2022 Collection has us prepared and excited for the structure and rhythm of getting back some of our previous normal.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Spring is a beautiful season filled with freshness and rebirth. Our Spring 2022 Collection has us prepared and excited for the structure and rhythm of getting back some of our previous normal.

Explore The Spring Collection...

Our collection has been built around these ideas, with compositions made out of wood by Artist Anna Bailey, to folds of fabric and plaster by artist Jessy Wilson.

We look to the striking bold hues of Genevive Leopold’s gestural paintings for energy and rejoice at seeing the spring foliage and whimsical illustrations of Marta Cortese.

We also saved some new floral works from our artist Paz Irarrázaval to introduce to you this spring. Enjoy!

Loop Architectural Materials is your local representative of Area Environmants. If you have any questions, want a sample, or would like a presentation, do not hesitate to contact us.
